001package gust.backend.model;
002
003
004/** Enumerates common kinds of persistence failures. Goes well with {@link PersistenceOperationFailed}. */
005public enum PersistenceFailure {
006  /** The operation timed out. */
007  TIMEOUT,
008
009  /** The operation was cancelled. */
010  CANCELLED,
011
012  /** The operation was interrupted. */
013  INTERRUPTED,
014
015  /** An unknown internal error occurred. */
016  INTERNAL;
017
018  /** @return Error message for the selected case. */
019  String getMessage() {
020    switch (this) {
021      case TIMEOUT: return "The operation timed out.";
022      case CANCELLED: return "The operation was cancelled.";
023      case INTERRUPTED: return "The operation was interrupted.";
024    }
025    return "An unknown internal error occurred.";
026  }
027}
